toolset.name: Aider Code Editor **EXPERIMENTELL**
toolset.description: Bietet Werkzeuge zur Interaktion mit dem Aider-Code-Editor.

config.header: --- Konfigurieren Sie die Einstellungen des Dateieditors (Aider) ({context}) ---
config.instructions:
Wählen Sie die Modelle und das Bearbeitungsformat, das der Dateiredakteur verwenden soll.
{save_location_info}
Lassen Sie die Eingabe an jeder Stelle leer, um die aktuelle Einstellung beizubehalten.
Geben Sie 'none' ein, um eine Einstellung auf den Standardwert zurückzusetzen.
config.save_location_global: Diese Konfiguration wird als globaler Standard für neue Chats gespeichert.
config.save_location_chat: Diese Konfiguration wird für den aktuellen Chat UND als globale Standardkonfiguration für neue Chats gespeichert.
config.model_header: --- Wählen Sie das Modell des Datei-Editors '{role}' aus ---
config.model_prompt: Geben Sie den Modellnamen für '{role}' ein (lassen Sie es leer, um '{current_setting}' beizubehalten, geben Sie 'none' ein, um auf die Standardeinstellung zurückzusetzen)
config.model_info_reset: Setze das {role} Modell auf die Standardwerte zurück ('{default_name}')
config.model_error_unknown: Unbekanntes Modell '{selected}'. Bitte wählen Sie aus der Liste oder geben Sie 'none' ein.
config.format_header: --- Wählen Sie das Bearbeitungsformat des Dateieditors ---
config.format_prompt: Geben Sie die Auswahl ein (0-{max_idx}), lassen Sie es leer, um die aktuelle Einstellung beizubehalten:
config.format_error_invalid: Ungültige Auswahl. Bitte versuchen Sie es erneut.
config.format_warn_cancel: Auswahl abgebrochen. Beibehalten der aktuellen Einstellung: {setting}
config.api_key_check_header: Überprüfe API-Schlüssel für ausgewählte Modelle des Datei-Editors...
config.api_key_error_check: Fehler bei der Überprüfung des API-Schlüssels für das Modell '{model_name}'. Überprüfen Sie die Protokolle.
config.save_success_chat: Dateikonfiguration für diesen Chat und global aktualisiert.
config.save_warn_missing_keys: Hinweis: Einige API-Schlüssel fehlen/wurden übersprungen. Stellen Sie sicher, dass sie in .env festgelegt sind.
config.save_error_failed: Die Aktualisierung der File Editor-Konfiguration ist fehlgeschlagen. Überprüfen Sie die Protokolle.

file_path.path_desc: Der absolute oder relative Pfad zur Datei.

instruction.instruction_desc: Die natürliche Sprache-Anweisung für die Bearbeitungsanfrage.

user_response.response_desc: Ihre Antwort auf die Aufforderung des Editors.

usage_guide.name: aider_usage_guide
usage_guide.description: Displays usage instructions and context for the Aider Code Copilot toolset.

add_file.name: add_file_to_copilot_context
add_file.description: Adds a file to the Code Copilot context, files in context can be used to understand the codebase and perform edits. Files to be added can be specified by absolute or relative paths. The file must exist in the filesystem.

error.no_chat: Error: No active chat session found.
error.init_failed: Error: File Editor not initialized or failed to restore state. Use start_file_editor first.
error.not_exists: Error: File '{path}' (resolved to '{abs_path}') does not exist.
error.outside_root: Error: Cannot add file '{path}' outside project root '{root}'.
error.different_drive: Error: Cannot add file '{path}' on a different drive than project root '{root}'.

add_file.warn_confirm_failed: Warning: Failed to confirm {path} was added successfully.

remove_file.name: remove_file_from_copilot_context
remove_file.description: Removes a file from the Code Copilot context. Files to be removed can be specified by absolute or relative paths. The file must have been added to the context previously.

error.no_chat: Error: No active chat session found.
error.init_failed: Error: File Editor not initialized or failed to restore state. Use start_file_editor first.

list_files.name: list_files_in_copilot_context
list_files.description: Lists all files in the Code Copilot context. This is useful to see what files are currently being edited or added for context.

error.no_chat: Error: No active chat session found.
error.init_failed: Error: Editor not initialized. Use start_file_editor first.

list_files.info_empty: No files are currently added to the editing session.

request_edit.name: request_copilot_edit
request_edit.description: Explain to the copilot what needs to be done. The editor will complete the request based on own knowledge and submitted files. Use clear instructions using natural language, you can include specific code snippets.

error.no_chat: Error: No active chat session found.
error.init_failed: Error: File Editor not initialized or failed to restore state. Use start_file_editor first.
error.no_files: Error: No files have been added to the editing session. Use include_file first.
error.in_progress: Error: An edit is already in progress for this session.
error.timeout: Error: Timed out waiting for Aider response.
error.queue_exception: Error: Exception while waiting for Aider: {error}
error.unknown_response: Error: Unknown response type '{type}' from Aider process.

request_edit.prompt_guidance: Aider requires input. Please respond using 'submit_editor_input'. Prompt: '{prompt}'

view_diffs.name: view_code_copilot_edit_diffs
view_diffs.description: Shows the git diff of changes made by the Code Copilot based on 'request_edit' tool in the current session. This is useful to see what changes have been made to the files. Works only if there was a git repository initialized in the project root.

error.no_chat: Error: No active chat session found.
error.init_failed: Error: File Editor not initialized or failed to restore state. Use start_file_editor first.
error.no_repo: Error: Git repository not available. Cannot show diff.

view_diffs.info_no_changes: No changes detected in tracked files.

undo_edit.name: undo_last_code_copilot_edit
undo_edit.description: Undoes the last edit commit made by the Code Copilot. This is useful to revert changes made to the files, might not work if the commit was made outside of the File Editor or if there is no git repository initialized.

error.no_chat: Error: No active chat session found.
error.init_failed: Error: File Editor not initialized or failed to restore state. Use start_file_editor first.
error.no_repo: Error: Cannot undo. Git repository not found or not configured.
error.cmd_module_missing: Error: Commands module not available in Aider.

close_editor.name: close_code_copilot
close_editor.description: Closes the file editing session with AI Code Copilot. Changes are saved automatically. Close it after you verified with the user they don't want to edit the files anymore.

error.no_chat: Error: No active chat session found to close the editor for.

close_editor.warn_error: File Editor session context possibly cleared (encountered error).

submit_input.name: respond_to_code_copilot_input_request
submit_input.description: Use to provide respond to Code Copilot only when requested (marked by '[CODE_COPILOT_INPUT_REQUEST]').

error.no_chat: Error: No active chat session found.
error.init_failed: Error: No active editor session found or state could not be restored.
error.empty_response: Error: Received empty response for submission.
error.not_waiting: Error: The editing process is not waiting for input.
error.timeout: Error: Timed out waiting for Aider response after submitting input.
error.queue_exception: Error: Exception while waiting for Aider after submitting input: {error}

submit_input.prompt_guidance: Aider requires further input. Respond using 'submit_editor_input'. Prompt: '{prompt}'
